<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Embrace the Pain](/Feats.aspx?ID=1623) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
A creature damages you with a melee attack.

</column>

---

Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) the triggering creature or to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the creature of the triggering weapon.
name: Embrace the Pain
